title: Easy Locomotion Toolkit
description: Easy locomotion system with module based logic, quickly handles any character with full network and AI support.
longDescription:
Quick:
  • Demonstration video and tutorial playlist > Youtube Link!
  • Playable demo > Download Link!


(UPD - 2022)

I am happy to announce all my Unreal Engine content is free now!

I hope to support more content creators in the future!

Latest info about content in the video ~ Youtube Link!

Please watch the video, it explains my current situation and info about support.

Also use the discord channel for any questions or support now ~ Discord Link!


About:

Easy locomotion toolkit is a complex system to simplify and boost the locomotion building for any kind of character.

This system does include a single component with module-based calculations, this keeps your character Blueprint and AnimBP fully empty for your custom logic, all the locomotion data is separated by modules now.

Feature to directly swap character's animset by datatable logic, add more movement modes, animations, and conditions with just a few clicks!


No need to copy/paste the characterBP logic from char to char, as a single component it can be attached to any char or actor class, use custom actor types with locomotion, the system directly makes needed calculations, then the actor can read the data and use relevant animations.


As a module-based system, each module can add its portion of logic calculations, which can be later used in AnimBP with a few clicks, all logic gets replicated via structures and everything is automated, no more struggling with integration and copy/pasting functions.

Full network and AI support, optimized structures usage, and client-based calculations make the system smooth for local clients.


Note:

Versions: 4.19.2-4.24+

Warning! The demonstration animations are not included! The system does come with basic UE4 starter animations, the animations from the video are from other marketplace packages, which can be easily integrated if you have them.

The projects made in older engine versions should work fine in newer engine versions by default, in most cases there is no need for update if it's outdated, but sometimes the engine does change some functions and it may lead to errors in newer engine versions, if you found any errors then notify us and we will make quick fix for the new engine version.

Recommended to have at least basic understanding of blueprints, do not purchase this system if you are very new to engine, if you need help or have questions then write to our support email.

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • As a single main component can be easily added to any actor type, haves editable features, and variables.
  • Better locomotion management, keep characterBP and AnimBP clean now for your custom logic.
  • Features to use animset and have separate anim data for characters, swap them on the fly.
  • Full network and AI support, optimized usage, and smooth client calculations.
  • Ready to use with any existing actors, easy and quick integration.
  • As modules can be extended in infinity ways, any amount of custom calculations can be added.
  • Can be used for any project type and any actor class includes full multiplayer and AI support.
  • The animations from demonstration videos are not included, the system uses UE4 starter animations.


Disk Size: 22.9 MB

Number of Blueprints: 5

Input: Keyboard/Mouse/Gamepad/Any

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: All/Tested only on win

Supported Target Build Platforms: All/Tested only on win


The new version is compatible with engine versions: 4.19.2-4.26

Warning! The demonstration animations are not included! The system does come with basic UE4 starter animations, the animations from the video are from other marketplace packages, which can be easily integrated if you have them.
